name: Stroller
description: Family of four with a 4 year old boy with cancer, who needs a sturdy but lightweight stroller. The stroller that he used before diagnosis and hospital treatment is unsuitable now. The child is unable to walk independently for now, and will have weekly appointments at hospital after discharge. Father is sole breadwinner as mother has to care for the younger sibling, who is only a few months old.

passiton.name: stroller
passiton.description: preloved stroller. clean. wheels still ok but not so smooth to maneuver. can fold into umbrella style to store. for light weight child 4-5 years old shld be ok

name: Milk
description: Family is a low income family with multiple young children, of which 2 of them are still on milk and diapers. As family is currently facing tight finances and child protection concerns (father also difficulties securing a job due to his health), it has been difficult for the family to get some stable income. Mother is the main caregiver of the young children as they are not in childcare yet. The family would require some milk  support in the mean time as FSC work with them in exploring childcare placement and managing the child protection concerns. It would be helpful if a donor can provide 4-6 tins of 1.8kg Lactogen 3. Please feel free to email me for more information, thank you!

passiton.name: Baby milk bottle warmer
passiton.description: Milk bottle warmer still in very good condition
passiton.location: Bukit Batok , Bukit Panjang, Choa Chu Kang, Dairy Farm, Hillview

name: Bicycle
description: Client has recently been released from prison, and has applied to further her studies under Yellow Ribbon. She hopes to receives donation of bicycle while she tries to reintegrate herself back to the community, to enable her to seek delivery-type of employment while she searches for stable employment. Thank you

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Lynette Tan

passiton.name: Exercise bicycle
passiton.description: Seldom used - hope that this will benefit someone

passiton.name: Children bicycle helmet
passiton.description:
2 pieces.

Delivery on weekday evening and weekend.
